subject: Assoc. Prof. Foaad Khosmood CTCCC 2020 TC Invitation
body:
Dear Assoc. Prof. Foaad Khosmood, California Polytechnic State University, USA Greetings from Mrs. Lily Tseng, conference secretary of 2020 Communication Technologies and Cloud Computing Conference (CTCCC 2020, http://www.ctccc.org/), which will take place in Cambridge University, UK during March 19-22, 2020. I am delighted to inform you that, owing to your expertise and achievement, you are one of the very few selected nominees for the conference Technical Program Committee. CTCCC 2020 is an annual meeting which aims to provide opportunities for delegates to exchange new ideas and research findings face to face, to establish business or research relationships and to find global partners for future collaboration. On behalf of all the organizing committees, Im sincerely inviting you to join the conference technical program committee. As the technical committee member, you will be required to review 2-4 papers in your areas when the submission begins. We are glad to offer you the following support when you attend the conference: * conference certificate*. We look forward to working with you to make CTCCC 2020 a great success. Your reply before September 13th will be greatly appreciated.

Dear Assoc. Prof. Foaad Khosmood,

California Polytechnic State University, USA

Greetings from Mrs. Lily Tseng, conference secretary of 2020 Communication Technologies and Cloud Computing Conference (CTCCC 2020, http://www.ctccc.org/), which will take place in Cambridge University, UK during March 19-22, 2020.

I am delighted to inform you that, owing to your expertise and achievement, you are one of the very few selected nominees for the conference Technical Program Committee.

CTCCC 2020 is an annual meeting which aims to provide opportunities for delegates to exchange new ideas and research findings face to face, to establish business or research relationships and to find global partners for future collaboration.

On behalf of all the organizing committees, Im sincerely inviting you to join the conference technical program committee.

As the technical committee member, you will be required to review 2-4 papers in your areas when the submission begins.

We are glad to offer you the following support when you attend the conference:

* conference certificate*.

We look forward to working with you to make CTCCC 2020 a great success.

Your reply before September 13th will be greatly appreciated.
